attributes.action: Make County Councils have to take account of the people they represent.
attributes.additional_details: Make Oxford County Council change their plans for the A40 between Witney and Wolvercote Roundabout.  More houses are being built in Bampton, Brize Norton and Carterton.  All the jobs are in Oxford.  The A40 is the major route to Oxford.  The A40 is already at a standstill, add to that all the people from the new housing and it will not move at all.  They can put the 54m they have budgeted for this work to better use.  We need a dual carriageway all the way from Witney to Oxford.
attributes.background: The A40 from Witney to Oxford is already congested, Oxford County Councils plans to fix this are inadequate. They want to make it dual carriageway from Witney to Eynsham then a bus lane to Oxford. This will not ease the problem. It must be dual carriageway all the way. It's costing 54m so must work.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Planning (including local infrastructure to support new housing) is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Oxfordshire County Council also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:

http://mycouncil.oxfordshire.gov.uk/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx
